response.overview: This time, it is popular in Douyin  A short video episode  Presented in a series from beginning to end.  The story is that everything can see the future  It started from a magic mirror. Tin Hao Ha  He is a recent heart transplant recipient.  After heart transplant surgery, he saw a girl in the mirror  Always seeing and falling in love. I love that girl too much  Even his future wife was disconnected  But this girl was not as pure as he thought  When he realized that he was approaching him on purpose  His future wife has left him.  Behind the reason for approaching him  What big problems will there be?  How to solve these problems
response.title: Heart In The Mirror
